title: See for yourself
creator_credit: Guy Brenton, Humphrey Swingler, Film Producers Guild and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Several representatives of industry explain how their firms have benefited from the exchange of ideas made possible by the Circuit Scheme run by local productivity committees.
